sentences.en: The abbeys were founded in the 12th century by King David as a bulwark against the English.
sentences.cn: 这些修道院是大卫王于12世纪修建的抵抗英国人的堡垒。

sentences.en: He was a bulwark against further Blairite defections.
sentences.cn: 他是对抗布莱尔派进一步背叛的最后堡垒。

sentences.en: Can a distracted America remain a bulwark for eastern Europe?
sentences.cn: 慌乱的美国仍能作为东欧的支柱吗？
